title: Cute Beast World: Beast Husband, Memeda! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Beasts   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Polyandry   Pregnancy   Reverse Harem   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transported to Another World   Tribal Society   Weak to Strong   Werebeasts
author: 大果粒
description:
Lin HuanHuan never expected to be transmigrated while she was soaking in the bath!

Fine, so be it if she really had transmigrated, but what was up with having her tranmigrate into a beast world?!

Handsome beastmen were walking around everywhere, wearing only an animal skin skirt and revealing their big long legs!

What? They also want her to give birth to cubs?!

NONONO! Interracial love never ends well. Extremely lovingly (quickly),¹ let me go!

¹TN: Pun on the words ‘extremely lovingly’ (ku ai). It has the same pronounciation as ‘quickly’ (kuai) but broken up into two words.>
